WRITING.TEXT: How these are pointless, I am unable to comprehend.
Judging on your ID i'm guessing you're Indian. Can a 1440p monitor be found in India? I'm tired of searching.

WRITING.TITLE: About to order the parts. Please take a look and feel free to suggest changes
WRITING.TEXT:
So I will be using this build for gaming on a 1080p@60hz monitor. I'll be also be using it for music production and game development in Unity. Budget is not a problem. So feel free to suggest changes you think will be right.
I stay in India and will be buying the parts here itself.
Here's the build I've come up with.
PCPartPicker part list](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/list/rdMgCy) / [Price breakdown by merchant](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/list/rdMgCy/by_merchant/)
Type|Item|Price :----|:----|:---- **CPU** | [Intel Core i7-6700K 4.0GHz Quad-Core Processor](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/tdmxFT/intel-cpu-bx80662i76700k) | 28490.00 @ Amazon India **CPU Cooler** | [Corsair H115i 104.7 CFM Liquid CPU Cooler](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/RH2rxr/corsair-cpu-cooler-cw9060027ww) | 13200.00 @ Amazon India **Motherboard** | [Asus Z170 PRO GAMING ATX LGA1151 Motherboard](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/KgJkcf/asus-motherboard-z170progaming) | 15450.00 @ Amazon India **Memory** | [Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3000 Memory](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/MYH48d/corsair-memory-cmk16gx4m2b3000c15) | 8285.00 @ Amazon India **Storage** | [Samsung 850 EVO-Series 250GB 2.5" Solid State Drive](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/3kL7YJ/samsung-internal-hard-drive-mz75e250bam) | 7998.00 @ Amazon India **Storage** | [Western Digital Caviar Blue 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/MwW9TW/western-digital-internal-hard-drive-wd10ezex) | 3696.00 @ Amazon India **Video Card** | [Zotac GeForce GTX 1070 8GB AMP! Edition Video Card](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/MPX2FT/zotac-geforce-gtx-1070-8gb-amp-edition-video-card-zt-p10700c-10p) | 29845.17 @ Amazon India **Case** | [Corsair Carbide 400C ATX Mid Tower Case](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/FbKhP6/corsair-case-cc9011081ww) | 13749.00 @ Amazon India **Power Supply** | [Antec TruePower Classic 750W 80+ Gold Certified ATX Power Supply](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/9TsKHx/antec-power-supply-tp750c) | 8290.00 @ Amazon India **Monitor** | [Dell S2415H 23.8" 1920x1080 60Hz Monitor](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/gZL7YJ/dell-monitor-s2415h) | 14900.00 @ Amazon India | *Prices include shipping, taxes, rebates, and discounts* | | **Total** | **143903.17** | Generated by [PCPartPicker](http://pcpartpicker.com) 2017-01-13 11:48 IST+0530 |
Great. Thank you. And should I go with a 3TB HDD or 2?
I will buy a 144 hz monitor next year. Will it still be overkill?
I had a build in mind. I also edited it in the post now.
I'll edit the post.
Ballpark means an area or range within which an amount or estimate is likely to be correct. I'm sure others have done a pretty good job helping you with your build.

WRITING.TITLE: Gaming, music production, game development rig build help.
WRITING.TEXT:
###Build Help/Ready:
**Have you read the sidebar and [rules](http://www.reddit.com/r/buildapc/wiki/rules)? (Please do)** Yes. Definitely.
**What is your intended use for this build? The more details the better.**
Gaming. Titles like Dark Souls series, Witcher, GTA and any new titles. Also music production in FL Studio Ableton. Game development in Unity engine.
**If gaming, what kind of performance are you looking for? (Screen resolution, FPS, game settings)**
1080p@60hz Ultra detail.
**What is your budget (ballpark is okay)?**
As I stay in India Rs. 1,60,000.
**In what country are you purchasing your parts?**
India.
**Post a draft of your potential build here (specific parts please). [Consider formatting your parts list.](http://www.reddit.com/r/buildapc/wiki/pcpp) Don't ask to be spoonfed a build (read the rules!)**.
I would love to have a Gtx 1080 if I could squeeze it in my budget. I also need a 24" monitor. [PCPartPicker part list](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/list/sygCM8) / [Price breakdown by merchant](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/list/sygCM8/by_merchant/)
Type|Item|Price :----|:----|:---- **CPU** | [Intel Core i5-6600K 3.5GHz Quad-Core Processor](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/gx648d/intel-cpu-bx80662i56600k) | 19720.00 @ Amazon India **CPU Cooler** | [Corsair H100i v2 70.7 CFM Liquid CPU Cooler](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/CrDzK8/corsair-cpu-cooler-cw9060025ww) | 10650.00 @ Amazon India **Motherboard** | [\*Gigabyte GA-Z170XP-SLI ATX LGA1151 Motherboard](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/8q38TW/gigabyte-motherboard-gaz170xpsli) | 15599.00 @ Amazon India **Memory** | [\*Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3000 Memory](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/6ntWGX/corsair-vengeance-lpx-16gb-2-x-8gb-ddr4-3000-memory-cmk16gx4m2b3000c15w) | 7356.43 @ Amazon India **Storage** | [PNY CS1311 240GB 2.5" Solid State Drive](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/7v38TW/pny-internal-hard-drive-ssd7cs1311240rb) | 4918.00 @ Amazon India **Video Card** | [Gigabyte GeForce GTX 1080 8GB G1 Gaming Video Card](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/3fvZxr/gigabyte-video-card-gvn1080g1gaming8gd) | 65807.00 @ Amazon India **Case** | [\*Corsair Carbide 400C ATX Mid Tower Case](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/FbKhP6/corsair-case-cc9011081ww) | 13749.00 @ Amazon India **Power Supply** | [\*EVGA SuperNOVA G2 550W 80+ Gold Certified Fully-Modular ATX Power Supply](https://in.pcpartpicker.com/product/qYTrxr/evga-power-supply-220g20550y1) | 10694.00 @ Amazon India | *Prices include shipping, taxes, rebates, and discounts* | | **Total** | **148493.43** | \*Lowest price parts chosen from parametric criteria | | Generated by [PCPartPicker](http://pcpartpicker.com) 2017-01-11 17:37 IST+0530 |
**Provide any additional details you wish below.**
I will not be upgrading atleast for the next 5 to 6 years. I may buy a 144hz 1080p monitor next year though.
It really is brilliant.
Yes. Maybe we still are not in the range. Im afraid nothing else can be done.
Are you there yet?
Put it on and select the last god/goddess in the list. I'll put my sign down.
Do you have the name engraved ring?

I'm currently reaching the end of my Dark Souls 2 run. And I am loving enjoying it as much as I did when I played Dark Souls 1 back in the day.
^Please ^don't ^hate ^me
From hate mail to hate hack. We have come a long way.
Effigies are dropped by a specefic enemy in later game period. Killing invaders also rewards with an effigy. And you will be invaded a lot. So there is no need to worry about it.

You have got most of the things correct. Level adaptibility to a point where you have 105 agility. This will give you better iframes while rolling.
Also the there is the introduction of the effigy system. You dont have to rest at a bonfire to turn human again. And human effigies are quite common. So dont fear exploring.
Would be way more pricey ,wouldn't it?
The game crashes on the Nvidia 10 series cards? I'm going to buy a 1080 soon. This doesn't sound good.
This. I bought a ton of games in the winter sale. Haven't installed even a single one. The craving for dark souls is a void that can never be filled.
I agree. I was skeptical going into DS2 from DS1. As many flaws it had I can safely say I really really enjoy the came. And it is very very close to the affection I have for the first one.
I haven't played DS3 yet? Is the PVP not good?

Mainly a Str build. Have 42 in Str, 27 Vitality, 32 Adp. I powerstance a Greatsword +10 and Bastard Sword +10. It's actually my main character. For armour is use black set robes. Really love the look.
Nah m8, just fists.
You mean as a build?
upto NG+7
Yep. What is the meta? I'm currently 130 and finding duels in no time.

WRITING.TITLE: PVP in this game.
WRITING.TEXT:
It's so awesome. So smooth. And the arena of Brotherhood of Blood is so awesome.
Yes there are no rewards and stuff but its too much fun. Fights are fun because you find a variety of builds to fight with. PVP has easily become my favorite aspect of this game.
It's fast because it's Bloodborne's engine. Also try rolling. It's OP. Carry on with the game. It's pretty awesome.
Walls are OP.

Mainly due to the adaptability, souls memory mechanics. It'll never surpass Dark Souls 1.
But it's a bad game in no way. I'm currently on my first playthrough. And i must admit the later half of the game is really good. And the DLCs are some of the best souls content ever. Definitely play the game. Also plus points are the sheer number of builds you can go with, NG+ is actually different and last but not the least FASHION SOULS.

If you're having trouble you can come back later with an upgraded weapon which can stunlock the Heide Knights. The area is super easy with a fully upgraded weapon. Keep trying. But you have the choice to come back later.
Stop right there Satan!
